Title: dotnetfireball
Description: Fireball Framework is project that aim to create the best controls and libraries for developer, the project already contains some control, CodeEditorControl with Syntax Highlight, Collections,Outlook Navigation bar and etc..
HomeWiki:
The project is not supported anymore because of missing time, if you need an updated version of the code editor you should look at http://code.google.com/p/alsing/wiki/SyntaxBox is the original creator, of that component, so check out Roger SyntaxBox if you need a never version
Thanks


Project Home Page http://www.dotnetfireball.net

Project Description
Fireball Framework is project that aim to create the best controls and libraries for developer, the project already contains some control, CodeEditorControl with Syntax Highlight, Collections,Outlook Navigation bar and etc..


What is included on the Fireball Framework
  • Generic Collections
  • FreeImage Wrapper
  • Gdi Wrapper
  • Zip/7z/Gzip/Tar Support
  • Syntax Colored Editor for making your own ide
  • Outlook 2003 Bar Style
  • Windows XP Collapsible Panels
  • And more ...

iNotepadFireball Examples
http://www.inotepad.net
